module.name: SMS
module.description: This module is used to configure and manage SMS chat interfaces inside of the new UCP.
module.changelog: *12.0.9* Use contact manager if present *12.0.8* Updates for UCP *12.0.7* FREEPBX-7992 Deleting conversations, last message date, reverse sorting fixes. Security. *12.0.6* UCP tweaks *12.0.5* Undefined Index Warning Fix *12.0.4* Clean up so we dont see undefined index issues
